code: import*as React from'react';export default function useKeyedChildListeners(){var _React$useRef=React.useRef({getState:{},beforeRemove:{}}),keyedListeners=_React$useRef.current;var addKeyedListener=React.useCallback(function(type,key,listener){keyedListeners[type][key]=listener;return function(){keyedListeners[type][key]=undefined;};},[keyedListeners]);return{keyedListeners:keyedListeners,addKeyedListener:addKeyedListener};}
